description: The image shows a collection of old VHS tapes stacked haphazardly in a cardboard box. Some tapes are piled on top of each other, while others are placed upright, revealing labels of various TV shows and movies. The scene suggests a clearing out or sorting of old media, possibly from a home or storage area. The tapes are visibly worn, indicating they have been used and stored for a long time. This image captures a nostalgic element, reflecting the era when VHS was a popular format for video recording and playback.
poem:
There once was a box full of tapes,
With movies and shows in all shapes.
They sat in a pile,
Forgotten awhile,
A portal to past cine escapes.
